overview: Jan McDaniel joined BrightTALK in 2008 as the chief marketing officer. During her career in marketing, she has worked for and advised some of the largest business-to-business technology companies, including Hewlett-Packard, IBM, Intel, Oracle, and Apple. During her 16 years at Hewlett-Packard, she was responsible for launching and sustaining momentum for major products and contributed to the HP/Compaq merger team. In 2005, she joined Intel, where she managed the companyâ€™s enterprise marketing and brand strategy. Ms. McDaniel holds a bachelorâ€™s of science degree from the University of California, Davis.
